statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT age, gender, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE income <= 30000;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE location='New York' AND income > 50000
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 OR income < 40000 ORDER BY age ASC, income DESC
SELECT customer_id, gender, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE location='California'
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM marketing_messages ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT city, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT message_text, message_type FROM marketing_messages WHERE recipient_id = 'f44a9a74-9b51-43c3-bf3c-0ce1bd8f43fb';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, gender, city FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT message_text, message_type, send_date FROM marketing_messages WHERE send_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY send_date ASC;
SELECT name, age, city FROM customer_demographics WHERE city IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id=purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, message_text FROM customers INNER JOIN marketing_messages ON customers.customer_id=marketing_messages.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'female'
SELECT customer_id, amount, item FROM purchases WHERE amount > 50 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM marketing_messages WHERE message_date >= '2022-08-01' AND message_date <= '2022-08-31' ORDER BY message_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(message_id) AS num_messages FROM marketing_messages GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_messages > 5
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, product_name, price, quantity FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id=1002 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, product_name, price FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM Customers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, gender, location FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_name, age, income FROM Customers JOIN Demographics ON Customers.customer_id = Demographics.customer_id WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 100000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, Orders.total_amount FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
